summary: WHEN VEHICLE IS AT A COMPLETE STOP OR IDLING AND GAS IS APPLIED, THE VEHICLE  HESITATES TO ACCELERATE, THEN LAUNCHES  FORWARD WHEN ACCELERATOR ENGAGES.  THE DEALERSHIP INDICATED THAT  THIS IS A RESULT OF A FAULTY PISTON IN THE TRANSMISSION, AND THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THIS MODEL/YEAR  VEHICLE. PLEASE PROVIDE MORE DETAILS. TS
